data.title: Burnout Dominator vs Burnout paradise
data.meta_description: I had Burnout Dominator for PS2, and it is without a doubt the best car game I have played.
data.text:
I love Paradise myself. I'm very glad they patched in the option to restart races though, originally you had to manually drive back to the start every time.

I like the lack of rigid structure which seems to be exactly what the OP dislikes, ah well to each his own

0

I still think Burnout Revenge is the best.

I like Paradise but I don't like it anywhere near as much as the older style Burnout games because I hate the free roam BS. I'd prefer to be able to just pick a race/event from a menu & then go race rather than having to drive around looking to events.

Paradise is actually the 1st Burnout game I've never played through to 100% complete, Got bored/fed up about 30% through.

0

Yes Burnout Revenge was an awsome game, as was Burnout 2 which I also loved.

I didn't think much of Burnout Dominator personally. Criteron should have left all the elements of Burnout Revenge for this game, as it feels like a bit of a backward step.

At first I didn't rank Burnout Paradise either, but the more you play this it does get a lot easier and once you learn all the routes and all the roads, this game will keep you hooked for hours

0
